casebody.data:
176 A.3d 227 IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION (ANGELO ANNUZZI-CROSS-PETITIONER)

C-390 September Term 2017

079933 December 8, 2017

ON CROSS PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A cross-petition for certification of the judgment in A-4760-14 and A-164-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the cross-petition for certification is granted.
